Title: Automated Cocktail Machine
Features: Custom Cocktail Creation: Mix and match ingredients to create unique cocktails.
Automated Dispensing: Accurately measure and dispense liquids with servo motors and pumps.
User-Friendly Interface: Select cocktails and customize ingredients using a mobile app.
Real-Time Monitoring: Track ingredient levels, dispensing status, and machine health.
Safety Features: Emergency stop button, overflow sensors, and safety interlocks for user protection.
Customizable Recipes: Add, edit, and save cocktail recipes for future use.
